## streamSort() function

Transducer. Similar to , however uses proper sliding window and insertion sort instead of fully sorting window as done by .

```
[...streamSort(4, [5,9,2,6,4,1,3,8,7,0])]
// [ 2, 4, 1, 3, 5, 6, 0, 7, 8, 9 ]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function streamSort<A, B>(n: number, opts?: Partial<SortOpts<A, B>>): Transducer<A, A>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> |  |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;SortOpts&lt;A, B&gt;&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<A, A>`
